long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Exchange Cryptocurrency Anonymously - Safe, Quick & Easy

Looking for crypto without ID? Want coins without KYC?
NKX is the ultimate exchange for simplicity and privacy.
This is the simplest and easiest to use app for trading crypto.

No Registration
You don't need to sign-up - Trading is accountless. Just turn on and start trading. No email or phone confirmation required. Not even an account or profile. Maximum convenience.

No Verification
Finally, a cryptocurrency app that doesn't require ID. You never have to show your identity for coin swaps. Complete Anonymity. Trade without verification.
